is a first class town in Villupuram district in
. Tindivanam is a main hub connecting

to southern part of Tamilnadu. It also connects Kanchipuram to southern Tamilnadu and Podicherry with Bangalore. NH 45 connects Chennai to Trichy via Tindivanam and NH 66 connects Pondicherry to Krishnagiri via Tindivanam.

You can reach Tindivanam from Chennai through bus or train. The closest airport is Anna International Airport in Chennai. Approximately every two minutes there is bus to Tindivanam from Chennai, with travel time of about two hours.
Groundnut and watermelon are famous in Tindivanam.
